lines.text: Asshole!
Eh, Captain asshole.
Like my ex-wife. Anything I say, she does the opposite.
Guess you got a promotion, huh?
Things change Charlie... Things change.
I guess Rick's had a little too much coffee again?
Rick has got a bug up his butt. See. He's gone and discovered himself a magnetic space anomaly. And he's gotten stiff in the jock.
It's rust.
Magnify times four, please.
Now it's great big rust.
We got a goldmine here. I can smell it.
I can sure smell something.
Nuclear core is reading just shy of the red. Nearly to alert.
Radiation?
Negative. It looks more like natural decay. I'd give her about a month before we all glow in the dark.
Don't kind about shit like that. Just show me where the pharmacy is.
What's the matter? Feeling a little bit under the weather there Bernie?
What's the matter?
Rick! Cargo bay.
Seems our fearless leader has some plans for Terracor's long-lost pod.
You mean steal it? Steal what's inside?
Yup, leave us here counting R.E.M.s as we glow in the dark.
Scum bag. Are you sure?
Well, uh, that means everybody I know is.
They're dead. They're toast. They're history.
That's not normal.
No shit, Sherlock.
No, I mean they don't usually turn from a fight. Or a meal.
I thought you said there was no radiation danger.
Well, Fran, maybe the nuclear core just changed its mind.
Congratulations, Charlie, you have just murdered the ship.

Rick and Bernie are dead. For all I know we may have been infected by some alien germ. So unless anyone else has another suggestion, I propose that we just hole up here and wait for them to come rescue us. They will be here any minute.
Yeah. If we don't blow up first.
Just what did you do to him?
Me? Nothing. That was the Critters. Look, I'm a bounty hunter, and I got job to do.
You an alien?
No, do I look like one?
What do these things look like?
What do they look like?
Yeah.
You ever see a piranha?
It's a fish, right?
That's right. They look nothing like a piranha. But they're hungry like a piranha.

[Ethan just froze a Critter]
Chill out.
[pause]
Asshole.
[first lines]

[Charlie finds the last Critter eggs]
Alright you gum-balls.
[last lines]

[Charlie puts on some cool sunglasses]
Captain Charles McFadden.
I'll pack the ship. You get the kids.
